answers.answer: Mine did the same thing. My doctor said that when the baby moves her heart rate should increase,

I get them twice a week and last week the very same thing happened to me I was freaking out too thought something was wrong!! the doctor said think about when your moving quickly your heart rate goes up n when you stop it goes back to normal. N said If it didn't change then that's reason to worry :)

question: I've been having regular NST'S and baby's heart rate has been around 120-150. Today it was 150-all way to 196 with some lower #'s in there as well. Dr said it looked good. I was freaking out.  Has anyone else experienced this?  Was all ok? Oh I'm almost 36 wks n I have gestational diabetes.
title: NST and high heart rate for baby
